image-reference.title: Ducts or other construction separating soil and waste pipes from units — plasterboard to achieve RW of 30 (method 1)

image.alt: Ducts or other construction separating soil and waste pipes from units — plasterboard to achieve RW of 30 (method 1)

desc-note.p: 2 layers of plasterboard each 10 mm thick, fixed to timber studs not less than 75 mm x 50 mm and spaced at not more than 400 mm centres.
